Metadata: Sea Grant U-California (Volume 1, No. 1, No. 2, No. 3, March, May, and July 1973; Volume 2, No. 1 and No. 2, September and November 1973)
University of California Institute of Marine Resources/Sea Grant
Published bimonthly. Changed name to Newsletter.

Topics include: 24 sections of a 8.5 -foot-long PVC pipe, by Gerald Wick; Quinquennial history: seven/nine UC campuses, plus one state university; Industry (Mona-Mona Products Corp) nabs Bodega Bay Aquaculture boy; Aquaculture-​-​but why?; State and federal legislation proposed to ease matching funds pinch; New anti-fouling agent (Juvenile hormone mimic ZR-512); Beach survey notes squatter problem; funding; Oil companies disavow new Santa Barbara slick SG chem-engineer checks claim; Moss Landing marine labs; MLML and sablefish; Simple chemical test for toxins could eliminate need for mussel quarantine; Plaque hails UC achievement
